input.sentences: nightfall over our city and a 4th of july show about to begin
the fireworks rang out in the night . it was fun and loud .
this was probably the biggest explosion of them all .
this one looked like little airplanes all together .
the finale of it all . i enjoyed the fun fireworks show .
output.sentences: The first firework lit up the sky.
The next firework filled up the sky with light.
Then some new fireworks were launched that looked like bird people in the sky.
The nigh ended with a fantastic grand finale.
